title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Integrated Simulation Work for Virus Infection Diagnosis and Clinical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical terminology and basic infectious disease management knowledge
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can accurately analyze viral infection symptoms and epidemiological backgrounds through interactions with standardized patients (SPs)
Learners can compile differential diagnosis lists of at least three conditions by synthesizing physical examination results and test data
Learners can demonstrate decision-making processes incorporating linguistic communication skills and cultural contexts when establishing diagnostic plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
